price: (Mu ntangiriro) abantu bari umuryango umwe gusa (bemera Allah) nyuma baza gutandukana. Iyo bitaza kuba ijambo (ryo kudahaniraho) ryaturutse kwa Nyagasani wawe ryabanje, bari guhita bacirirwaho iteka (ryo kurimbuka) ku byo batumvikanagaho.
arabic: وَمَا كَانَ ٱلنَّاسُ إِلَّآ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَٱخۡتَلَفُواْۚ وَلَوۡلَا كَلِمَةٞ سَبَقَتۡ مِن رَّبِّكَ لَقُضِيَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ فِيمَا فِيهِ يَخۡتَلِفُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wamā kāna al-nāsu illā ummatan wāḥidatan fa-ikh'talafū walawlā kalimatun sabaqat min rabbika laquḍiya baynahum fīmā fīhi yakhtalifūna
